full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSHAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KU MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG PO
editor_(хянан_тохиолдуулагч): SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KU MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG PO
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SHRADDHA KA RA WARMA DANG, KA MA LA GUPTA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LOTZTSA BA RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BDAG SOGS RKANG DRUG TSOGS, ,THOS BSAM BSGOM DANG 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM SOGS KYI, SHES RAB SBRANG RTZI'I DGA' STON GYIS ROL PAS, PHI NANG GRUB MTHA'I MTHAR SON SGRIB GNYIS KYI, ,MUN 'JOMS KUN MKHYEN YE SHES THOB GYUR CIG ,BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE BA 'PHEL GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAM, ,
